name: Streets of Rage 4 Anniversary Edition
overview: Amongst the best beat’em up series ever created, jammin’ ‘90s beats and over the top street beating, the iconic series Streets of Rage comes back with a masterful tribute to and revitalization of the classic action fans adore. The all-time classic Streets of Rage, known as Bare Knuckle in Japan, is a beat ‘em up series known for this timeless gameplay and electronic dance influenced music. Streets of Rage 4 builds upon the classic trilogy’s gameplay with new mechanics, beautiful hand-drawn visuals and a God tier soundtrack. The Anniversary Edition includes the DLC Mister X Nightmare which adds : 3 new playable characters with new weapons and enemies A new survival mode with Weekly challenges Character customization to build your own fighting style and unlocking new moves
